Name.BusinessNameLine1: MARYLAND HALL FOR THE CREATIVE ARTS INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: MARYLAND HALL IS A MULTI-DISCIPLINE ARTS CENTER THAT PROVIDES EXCEPTIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR LIFELONG COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN ARTS EDUCATION, THE VISUAL ARTS AND PERFORMING ARTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: MARYLAND HALL IS A MULTI-DISCIPLINE ARTS CENTER THAT PROVIDES EXCEPTIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR LIFELONG COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN ARTS EDUCATION, THE VISUAL ARTS AND PERFORMING ARTS.
IRS990.Description: PROVIDE EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES IN THE CULTURAL ARTS.

Activity2.Description: PROVIDE OTHER CREATIVE ART PROGRAMS INCLUDING COOPERATIVE ART, VISUAL ART EXHIBITIONS, AND GENERAL OUTREACH.

Activity3.Description: PROVIDE A DIVERSE ARRAY OF PERFORMING ARTS PROGRAMS TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC.

ActivityOther.Description: VARIOUS OTHER PROGRAM SERVICE REVENUES DERIVED FROM RESIDENT COMPANY FACILITY RENTAL AND VENDING SALES.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: ENDOWMENT FUND WAS ESTABLISHED TO ENHANCE LONG-TERM FINANCIAL STABILITY OF THE INSTITUTION AND TO FURTHER ITS GOALS.
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSE NET WITH REVENUE

OtherNonCashContributionsTable.Description: FOOD AND AUCTION ITEMS FOR FUNDRAISER

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: IN-KIND FOOD AND AUCTION ITEMS FOR ARTS ALIVE FUNDRAISER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTE AND TREASURER BEFORE IT IS FILED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT ANNUALLY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR SALARY IS ESTABLISHED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. INCREASES ARE THE SAME PERCENTAGE AS OTHER STAFF AND APPROVED AS PART OF THE BUDGET. OTHER OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REVIEWED BY A SUPEVISOR AND GENERAL PERCENTAGE INCREASE TO ALL STAFF AND APPROVED AS PART OF THE BUDGET.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST FROM CFO OR FINANCE COMMITTEE.
BOARD OF DIRECTORS ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
